Cm Vengeance is a bow Bb Cm And arrows only justice when fired Bb Cm I have loved I have lost F Cm Bb I am the archer! Cm Devil at the door Bb Cm Standing with his right arm extended Bb Cm On a hunt For the kill F Cm Bb I am the archer!

Cm My home is on the horse I ride What emptiness without my bride Such heaviness inside This was the day the archer died
